mapper.select: SELECT site.*,user.id uid,user.username uusername,user.realname urealname,user.telephone utel,user.email uemail FROM site left join user On site.manage_id=user.id ORDER BY status DESC
SELECT site.*,user.id uid,user.username uusername,user.realname urealname,user.telephone utel,user.email uemail FROM site,user

SELECT site.*,user.id uid,user.username uusername,user.realname urealname,user.telephone utel,user.email uemail FROM site left join user On site.manage_id=user.id WHERE (site.site_name like CONCAT('%',#{queryStr},'%' ) or site.serial_number like CONCAT('%',#{queryStr},'%') or site.address like CONCAT('%',#{queryStr},'%') or site.telephone like CONCAT('%',#{queryStr},'%') or site.sensor_id_set like CONCAT('%',#{queryStr},'%') or user.realname like CONCAT('%',#{queryStr},'%'))
SELECT id FROM site WHERE manage_id=#{manageId}
SELECT site.*,user.id uid,user.username uusername,user.realname urealname,user.telephone utel,user.email uemail FROM site left join user On site.manage_id=user.id WHERE site.id=#{id}
SELECT value FROM ultrasonic_record WHERE sensor_id in (#{sensorIdSet}) ORDER BY time DESC limit 1
SELECT count(*) FROM site WHERE status=2
SELECT sensor_id_set FROM site WHERE id=#{siteId}
SELECT * FROM site WHERE (site_name like CONCAT('%',#{queryStr},'%') or serial_number like CONCAT('%',#{queryStr},'%') or telephone like CONCAT('%',#{queryStr},'%'))

SELECT DISTINCT site.id,site.site_name FROM record LEFT JOIN site ON record.site_id=site.id LEFT JOIN record_treatmentcar ON record.id=record_treatmentcar.record_id LEFT JOIN car ON record_treatmentcar.treatmentcar_id=car.id LEFT JOIN `user` ON car.driver_id=`user`.id WHERE car.driver_id=#{driverId}
